data.client_settings: The developer portal doesn't have a version in the console.... so, just canary the developer portal on 2018-12-29
data.actual_result: The keyboard focus is not on anything
data.expected_result: The keyboard focus should be back on the username field
data.short_description: Adding a tester to an application doesn't put keyboard focus back on the input
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the developer portal - Create an application, or go to an existing one - Go to the "App Whitelist" panel - Enter a non-existent username, and press the enter key - The keyboard focus is now not on the username field - This problem also occurs if the username does exist, but this isn't as much of an issue
